subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The Idaho State Board of Education voted, 7-1, to give the president of Boise State University, Bob Kustra, the authority to move it out of the Mountain West Conference and into the Big East.
snippet: The Idaho State Board of Education voted, 7-1, to give the president of Boise State University, Bob Kustra, the authority to move it out of the Mountain West Conference and into the Big East.
